sect1.title: External Object Linking Options
sect1.para: On this page can be specified the names for local objects to be created as a result of linking of the selected external ones.
In addition to the names for remote stored procedures following can be specified:

simplelist.member: PL Wrapper type - 'none' to use attach procedure SQL statement, 'SOAP execution' to return an array of result set suitable for publishing on SOAP endpoints, 'SQL execution' to return result set suitable for usage in the PL.
Paramater type - IN/OUT/INOUT this could be changed to appropriate value if driver does not report it properly.
Parameter Data Type - a SQL type for the parameter.
SOAP Data Type - an XML Schema type used to describe the parameter in the WSDL file if procedure is goining to be used as a SOAP method.

sect1.para: To link the objects listed press the 'Link' button.
